chart.title: Trade as a share of GDP
chart.subtitle: Sum of exports and imports of goods and services, divided by gross domestic product, expressed as a percentage. This is also known as the "trade openness index".
chart.citation: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)

Trade (% of GDP).citationShort: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Trade (% of GDP).citationLong: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Trade (% of GDP)” [dataset]. World Bank and OECD, “World Development Indicators” [original data].
